content: Dr Andreas Savva - University of Nicosia Skip to content APPLY Dr Andreas Savva Dr Andreas Savva Associate Professor School of Sciences and Engineering Department of Computer Science 22 841654 [email protected] Central Building›2nd Floor›B215 Brief CV Research Profile Dr Andreas Savva is an Associate Professor at the Department of Computer Science, University of Nicosia. He received a BSc Hons (First class) in Mathematics and Computing and a PhD in Computer Graphics from the University of North London. He has over 25 years of teaching experience at the University of North London, Kingsway College (London), Intercollege and the University of Nicosia. His research interests are in the area of Geometric Modeling, Subdivision Surfaces and Spline Methods, and he has more than 50 publications in refereed journals and conference proceedings. He was a member of many conferences organizing committees, has served as a reviewer for a large number of international conferences and was involved in a number of local and international funded projects.
